verses.text: Dying \w flies|strong="H2070"\w* spoil \w the|strong="H4194"\w* sweetness \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w the|strong="H4194"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*. \w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* more \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* than \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* shortlived \w folly|strong="H5531"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H2450"\w* his \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H2450"\w* his \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

Yea, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fool|strong="H5530"\w* \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* walketh \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, whereas \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w fool|strong="H5530"\w*, esteemeth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* fools.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath power, \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* cease.

\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H7451"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w error|strong="H7684"\w* proceeding \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prince:

\w A|strong="H5414"\w* fool \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w* dignity, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* beneath.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

He \w that|strong="H5307"\w* diggeth \w a|strong="H5307"\w* \w pit|strong="H1475"\w*, shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H2658"\w*: \w and|strong="H5307"\w* he \w that|strong="H5307"\w* breaketh \w a|strong="H5307"\w* hedge, \w a|strong="H5307"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* shall bite \w him|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0068"\w* that removeth \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* hurt \w by|strong="H5265"\w* them: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H0068"\w* that cutteth \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* wounded \w by|strong="H5265"\w* them.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* blunt, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* made blunt, \w with|strong="H2428"\w* much labour \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sharpened: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* after industry \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* follow \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* bite \w in|strong="H3808"\w* silence, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* better \w that|strong="H3808"\w* backbiteth secretly.

\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*: \w but|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* throw \w him|strong="H1104"\w* down headlong.

\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w folly|strong="H5531"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* \w talk|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* mischievous error.

\w A|strong="H1961"\w* \w fool|strong="H5530"\w* multiplieth \w words|strong="H1697"\w*. \w A|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*: \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*?

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* labour \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* afflict \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* bow \w to|strong="H0413"\w* go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0337"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thee, O \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w when|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* noble, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* due \w season|strong="H6256"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* refreshment, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* riotousness.

\w By|strong="H3027"\w* slothfulness \w a|strong="H3027"\w* building \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3027"\w* \w down|strong="H4355"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* weakness \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* drop \w through|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* feast: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w obey|strong="H6213"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

Detract \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* evil \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* thy private \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* air \w will|strong="H4428"\w* carry thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* thou hast \w said|strong="H1697"\w*.
